meanings.sent1: The clanks of the hammer hitting the metal echoed in the workshop.
meanings.sent2: I heard the clanks of pots and pans coming from the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The robot's clanks were so loud, it sounded like a musical instrument.
meanings.sent4: The clanks of the old gate opening reminded me of a rusty orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The clanks of the coins dropping into the piggy bank were music to my ears.

meanings.definition: To make a sharp, metallic sound
meanings.sent1: The metal pipe clanks when you hit it with a hammer.
meanings.sent2: I accidentally made the metal spoon clanks against the bowl.
meanings.sent3: The robot clanks loudly as it moves around the room.
meanings.sent4: Her heels clanks on the metal staircase as she climbed up.
meanings.sent5: The old car engine clanks noisily when starting up in the morning.

meanings.definition: A series of sharp, metallic sounds
meanings.sent1: The clanks of the chains as the anchor was raised filled the harbor.
meanings.sent2: The clanks of the machinery could be heard throughout the factory.
meanings.sent3: The clanks of the armor as the knights marched made them sound like robots.
meanings.sent4: The clanks of the keys on the typewriter created a rhythmic pattern.
meanings.sent5: The clanks of the metal gate closing signaled the end of the day.
